sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan zài yuánlín lǐ mànbù.
sentences.translation: I like strolling in the garden.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我午後在繁花似錦的园林裡散步，讓人感到無比的舒適與寧靜。
sentences.traditionalText: 我午後在繁花似錦的園林裡散步，讓人感到無比的舒適與寧靜。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ wǔhòu zài fánhuā sì jǐn de yuánlín lǐ sànbù, ràng rén gǎndào wúbǐ de shūshì yǔ níngjìng.
sentences.translation: Taking a walk in the blooming garden in the afternoon, one feels incomparable comfort and tranquility.
